backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining user profiles, vehicles, notifications, permissions, activation tokens, and helper methods for access control and onboarding.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs with high-level metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend source paths to short functional descriptions of components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/.eslintrc.cjs: ESLint configuration enabling TypeScript, React, and hook rules with custom warnings and ignored patterns.
frontend/.prettierrc.json: Prettier formatting configuration specifying spacing, quotes, print width, and other style rules.
frontend/CHANGE_CONTROL_POLICY.md: Defines protected interfaces and required review steps for modifying routes, auth flow, backend API, and data schemas.
frontend/CHANGELOG.md: Project changelog documenting releases, added features, changes, and protected interfaces for version 1.0.0.
frontend/ci-run-gates.sh: Shell script running all frontend quality gates via npm for CI pipelines.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes plus base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the PWA manifest, icons, and mounts the React app.
frontend/PR_CHECKLIST.md: Pull request checklist enforcing change‑control rules, quality gates, testing, and documentation requirements.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, language, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching strategies for static assets and network‑first behavior for HTML.
frontend/QUALITY_GATES.md: Documentation describing the automated quality gates and how to run them.
frontend/README_CHANGE_CONTROL.md: Guide explaining how to follow the project’s change-control process during development.
frontend/README_VERSIONING.md: Semantic versioning guide describing how to manage and update the project version.
frontend/src/__tests__/router-smoke.test: Empty test file placeholder for router smoke tests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Router routes, React Query client, and global providers including InternetIdentity.
frontend/src/components/activation/Vehic: UI card for checking activation status and redeeming activation tokens for vehicle registration.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access‑denied message with navigation back to the dashboard and admin info.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Error screen showing profile‑loading failures with backend health diagnostics and copy‑to‑clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Sign‑in page using Internet Identity with branding and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/auth/StartupBoot: Error screen handling startup bootstrap failures with retry logic and health diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/brand/AppLogo.ts: Renders the application logo in configurable sizes.
frontend/src/components/i18n/LanguageSwi: Empty placeholder file for a language switcher component.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapper handling header visibility, authentication state, and footer rendering.
frontend/src/components/lost/MarkLostDia: Dialog for reporting a vehicle as lost, stolen, or pawned with note submission.
frontend/src/components/lost/ReportFound: Dialog allowing users to submit a found-vehicle report with details.
frontend/src/components/nav/AppHeader.ts: Top navigation bar with user menu, navigation links, and admin detection.
frontend/src/components/system/TopLevelE: Error boundary catching unexpected render errors and displaying a fallback component.
UI for handling top-level errors with reload instructions.
frontend/src/components/transfer/Initiat: Panel to initiate vehicle ownership transfer, requiring PIN verification and generating a transfer code.
frontend/src/components/transfer/PinProm: PIN entry dialog with validation, error handling, and submit workflow.
frontend/src/components/vehicle/VehicleP: Displays a vehicle photo with fallback UI if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actors tied to user identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorBootstrapStat: Tracks actor bootstrap errors with timed retries and continuous retry for stopped canisters.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides admin-related queries and mutations including admin checks, invite codes, activation tokens, and system stats.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Performs periodic anonymous health checks against the backend and reports reachability and diagnostics.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, loading, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useLostVehicles.ts: Fetches lost vehicles and provides mutations to mark vehicles lost or found with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Fetches user notifications with polling and provides a mutation to mark notifications as read.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Runs onboarding mutation with detailed logging, error normalization, and cache invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/usePin.ts: React Query hooks for checking, setting, and updating a user's PIN via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Hooks to fetch and save the caller's user profile with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfers.ts: Provides mutations to initiate and accept vehicle ownership transfers and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicleCheck.ts: Mutation hook that checks vehicle status by engine number using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicleRegistratio: Hooks for checking registration activation status and redeeming activation tokens with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicles.ts: Hooks for listing, fetching, registering, and revoking ownership of vehicles with query invalidation.
frontend/src/i18n/i18n.ts: Empty file intended for global i18n configuration.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Empty file placeholder for an i18n provider component.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/zh-Hans.ts: Empty Simplified Chinese translation file placeholder.
frontend/src/i18n/storage.ts: Empty file intended for i18n language storage utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React Query, Internet Identity, and rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/__tests__/VehiclesPag: Test file placeholder with no implemented tests.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static page describing the app, its features, and admin contact information.
frontend/src/pages/AcceptTransferPage.ts: Form page for entering and submitting a vehicle transfer code with validation and feedback.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin-only dashboard showing system stats and handling admin access verification and error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInviteToke: Admin page that verifies admin status and lets admins generate, copy, and share user activation tokens with UI feedback and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing vehicle counts, notifications, and quick navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/LostVehiclesPage.tsx: Displays and filters reported lost, stolen, or pawned vehicles with search and status details.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows user notifications and allows marking them as read.
Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Handles user onboarding, collecting profile info and optionally setting up the first admin account.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Manages user profile viewing and editing, logout, and PIN creation or updates.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterVehiclePage.t: Provides a form to register a new vehicle, including photo upload and activation checks.
frontend/src/pages/ReportFoundVehiclePag: Allows users to check a vehicle by engine number and submit found-vehicle reports based on status.
Provides UI and logic for creating and updating a user PIN using form validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleCheckPage.tsx: Allows users to check a vehicle by engine number and displays status badges, alerts, photos, and report options.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed vehicle info, status, transfer options, and handles ownership revocation with PIN verification.
frontend/src/pages/VehiclesPage.tsx: Lists the user's vehicles with status badges and provides registration access based on activation state.
frontend/src/routes/__tests__/RootRouteG: Placeholder test file for RootRouteGate with no implemented tests.
frontend/src/routes/RootRouteGate.tsx: Routing gate that manages login state, profile loading, bootstrap retry logic, and redirects users to onboarding or the app layout.
frontend/src/utils/__tests__/bootstrapEr: Placeholder test file for bootstrap error utilities with no implemented tests.
frontend/src/utils/actorProxy.ts: Creates a safe proxy around backend actors to gracefully handle admin token initialization errors and avoid startup traps.
frontend/src/utils/actorQueryKey.ts: Generates a canonical React Query key for actor-related queries using the caller’s principal.
frontend/src/utils/adminAllowlist.ts: Defines a client-side admin allowlist and exposes helpers to check and retrieve allowlisted admin principals.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapError.ts: Classifies bootstrap errors, detects stopped canisters, extracts technical details, and provides user guidance messages.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeActorError.t: Normalizes backend actor errors into user-facing messages and categorizes them by type with context-specific handling.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingTroubleshoo: Empty utility module reserved for onboarding troubleshooting helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/version.ts: Defines the application’s version number and build date as the single source of truth.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the frontend.
frontend/vitest.config.ts: Vitest config file exists but is currently empty.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state and requirements, focusing on adding a PIN‑verified vehicle ownership revocation feature without affecting existing functionality.
